Package com.immortallabs.cardboard.game

Class Summary
Card The Card class contains all the necessary information to represent a Cardboard game card.
Deck Models a stack of CardBoard cards in a random order.
GameState The GameState Class models the gameplay rules of the Sets Game.
Score The Score class models each players score.
SetsBoard The SetsBoard class models the state of the game board by keeping track of what Cards are in the in-lay and what Cards are on the game board.
SoundPlayer Loads and plays sound files.
Timer Counts the number of seconds that have passed continuously.
 

Enum Summary
Card.COLOR The Color enumeration describes the color of the icons on the card.
Card.FILL The Fill enumeration describes the fill type of the icons on the card.
Card.NUMBER The Number enumeration describes the number of icons on the card.
Card.SHAPE The Shape enumeration describes the shape of the icons on the card.
CardBoardMessage The CardBoardMessage class models any of the various messages displayed to the user.
GameState.ACTION The ACTION enumeration represents each of the various actions the user can do to interact with the game.
GameState.GAMESTATE The GAMESTATE enumeration represents the current state of the game being played
GameState.GAMETYPE The GAMETYPE enumeration represents the various gametypes that could be in play
GameState.PLAYER The PLAYER enumeration represents the possible players (1-4) in the sets game.
GameState.PLAYERCOUNT The PLAYERCOUNT enumeration represents the current number of players in the game
Score.scoreEvent An enumeration that contains all the possible point additions and deductions needed to adjust a player's score.
SetsBoard.ROWS The possible number of rows in the game board
Timer.TIMER_LIMIT Represents the different possible timer limits
